about_the_game:
In Swingers, you navigate the beautiful—and sometimes dangerous—rainforest, swinging by your tongue between branches combined with well-timed jumps between to maintain your momentum. Manipulate your tongue length while swinging to optimize your speed and trajectory.

With these unique mechanics, we've created a satisfying game with a higher skill-cap than your average platformer.

Swingers has a built-in splits to track your current and best times for different segments so you can focus on improving your route and mechanics and see your time savings. Compare your personal bests to your friends', favorite streamers', or the global leaderboards!

Will you finish first—if at all?
detailed_description:
In Swingers, you navigate the beautiful—and sometimes dangerous—rainforest, swinging by your tongue between branches combined with well-timed jumps between to maintain your momentum. Manipulate your tongue length while swinging to optimize your speed and trajectory.

With these unique mechanics, we've created a satisfying game with a higher skill-cap than your average platformer.

Swingers has a built-in splits to track your current and best times for different segments so you can focus on improving your route and mechanics and see your time savings. Compare your personal bests to your friends', favorite streamers', or the global leaderboards!

Will you finish first—if at all?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617

name: Swingers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Navigate the beautiful—and sometimes dangerous—rainforest, swinging by your tongue and b-hopping with your tail in this precision platformer.
